Installation#

Installing the package#

The FuseMap package can be downloaded from GitHub. Installation is quick and performed using pip in the usual manner:

conda create -n fusemap python=3.10
conda activate fusemap
pip install fusemap

Note

A GPU is necessary for accelerating computations. Estimated time is 1 hours for integrating 300,000 cells on a single GPU.

Downloading the pretrained models#

You can download the following pretrained FuseMap models from Zenodo and put in local directories.

Mouse brain: xx

Mouse and human organs: xx
